title: json.Unmarshall() can't unmarshall top-level arrays
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Run the attached test.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Expected output:

number of items: 1
number of items (with workaround): 1

See instead:

number of items: 0
number of items (with workaround): 1


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

darwin/amd64


Which revision are you sync'ed to?  (hg log -l 1)

changeset:   4010:91c471680dc9

Please provide any additional information below.

According to specs, "A JSON text is a serialized object or array"
(http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4627)
Attachments: 1. json-test2.go (563 bytes)
